entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens I'm excited to be speaking at the first ever @LensProtocol community IRL meetup in Bangalore 🇮🇳 on December 2 along with @fabriguespe! 🌿 Come join us. Registration is open here SOCLLY 🌿: GM frens 👋 On December 2nd, Team @socllyhq will host the first-ever Lens community IRL meet-up in Bangalore, India in partnership with @BlivClub, @RivaMetaverse & You can apply for the event here: See u there 🚀 http://blockon.biz http://lu.ma/uoe0hwju

entry.summary: WeaveDB - Decentralized NoSQL DB on @ArweaveTeam ⚡️ WeaveDB is a decentralized Firestore, which brings smooth UX, complexity, and scalability to web3 dapps. entry.summary: RT Josh 👻🌿 | svg.eth Viewing contracts on etherscan is a pain in the arse, so I created a CLI tool to automatically pull any verified contract in your IDE, create you a development environment allowing you to modify, compile and deploy it all within the IDE you love. Enjoy! https://github.com/joshstevens19/evmc

entry.title: RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈: There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can u...
entry.summary: RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈 There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can use to get updated each time a new file "chunk" is uploaded, here I use the callback data to build a progress bar. Seconds later 90MB are on the permaweb.
